Play:
A Supplement to Chushingura
(Zōho chūshingura / 増補忠臣蔵)

Written By: Takeshiba Genzō (竹柴諺蔵)

First Staged: 1892

Reference: Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 143, September 1977; Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku September 1977 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

October 1971: A Supplement to Chushingura

September 1977: A Supplement to Chushingura

October 1979: A Supplement to Chushingura

September 1985: A Supplement to Chushingura

December 1993: A Supplement to Chushingura

April 1998: A Supplement to Chushingura

Characters:

Banzaemon Inami (Inami Banzaemon / 井浪伴左衛門)

Honzo Kakogawa (Kakogawa Honzō / 加古川本蔵)

Michitose (Michitose Hime / 三千歳姫 )

Page (Koshō / 小姓)

Wakasanosuke Momonoi (Momonoi Wakasanosuke / 桃井若狭之助)

Kanai (Yakko Kanai / 奴可内)

Servant (Yakko / 奴)
